Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Patrick Manthy
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my grandson and didn't expect much for $30. I got less than expected.  Cheap plastic, not even a good toy. I could not get it to work, my daughter could not get it to work. Trashed it. Don't waste your money.

Reviews.Title: camera 101
Reviews.Author: ashleenicole220
Reviews.Content: The camera should not be labeled with flash, it should be labeled "little blue light, requires extreme lighting for photo to be somewhat recognizable. If this is a camera for a kid, it would be fine. If this is a camera for a first time digital camera owner, get a Sony or something that is worth while.

Reviews.Title: How do you take a picture with this thing
Reviews.Author: Eric Herrel
Reviews.Content: I can't figure out how take a picuture with this thing its off very weird someone please explain how this thing works

Reviews.Title: Kinda flimsy
Reviews.Author: tponim
Reviews.Content: Got it because i wanted a camera. Its okay if your just taking oictures to later put on the computer or other devices.

Reviews.Title: Cobra Digital Slim Camera
Reviews.Author: KerriBerry
Reviews.Content: I hate this camera.The pictures are horrible and the videos look blue! You cant take any good pics at night because the light is so dim.

Reviews.Title: No too bad for kids
Reviews.Author: Melissa A. Trinci
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these for my girls. They love using my camera and were asking for their own, they were 7 & 8. The pictures weren't horrible and they absolutely loved them so that works for me! Plus I wasn't too worried when they were left outside after a day of play becasue they were not terribly expensive :-)

ProductInfo.Features:
5 megapixel resolution - Delivers excellent picture quality
Cobra zoom lens - Offers f/2.8 aperture
2.4" LCD color display - Enjoy easy focus selection and photo viewing
AVI movie file format - Record movies at up to 720 x 576 resolution on this compact camera
Internal li-ion rechargeable battery - Enjoy a long battery life
ProductInfo.Name: Cobra Digital Slim Digital Camera DC5000
